title: Thin Orange Line
content: Hi. Whenever I open Firefox v.85.0.2 x64 there is a thin orange line around the entire window (see pic.) Is it a setting I've missed, perhaps security (Eset NOD32 banking window has a colored border to indicate it's secure.) Other than that I've no idea why it's there. Appreciate your thoughts.
creator: cyba

title: Battery drain in macOS big sur
content:
After upgrading to macOS Big Sur, Firefox (latest version) are consuming battery in the background when computer is sleeping and the battery drained out in a couple of days.

I checked the energy graph in macOS and indicates the Firefox are using the significant battery. I restarted my computer several times and reinstalled the latest version of Firefox and the problem still exist.
creator: zhihun.dao

title: Failure to save preferences
content: In https://www.tvtv.ca/bc/abbotsford/v2t5t1/lu36260D I opt to save my favorite channels. They then appear whenever I go to the site. Until-- I leave Firefox or reboot the computer and the favorites are no longer available. If I do the same thing in Chrome, it remembers the preferences at all times, including after rebooting. Is there a way to make Firefox work as well as Chrome on this issue?
creator: 2ndcello

title: Pinterest seems to consistently break in firefox 85.0.2
content: I am having regular issues with Pinterest loading - especially any of the buttons. It works perfectly in other browsers, so I'm baffled! Any fixes? I've recently done a Firefox refresh.

title: Firefox/85 scored much slower/lower on speed-battle.com
content:
On the same computer (older Dell laptop)

speed-battle.com scores:

  1. Chrome/88: 521
  2. Edge/88: 486
  3. Opera/73: 398
  4. Firefox/85: 257

Firefox used to be on top, now it's at the bottom, WHAT HAPPENED???
creator: shawn88
